title: LEACKRA Women?s Leak Proof Period Panty - Gray
description:
The LEACKRA Women?s Leak Proof Period Panty is designed for ultimate comfort and protection during your cycle. Made from high-quality imported cotton, it provides soft, breathable, and irritation-free wear while preventing leaks and stains.

Its leak-proof multi-layer design ensures confidence and freshness throughout the day. The free size fit comfortably adjusts to Medium and Large body types, offering a snug yet gentle hold.

Perfect for daily use, overnight wear, or travel, this panty combines comfort, durability, and style ? keeping you confident every day of the month.

Key Features:

Leak-proof multi-layer protectionSoft and breathable imported cottonFree size fits Medium to Large100% fine quality materialIdeal for period days, light bladder leaks & daily comfort
